doc.after: Bengal played a major role in the Indian independence movement in which revolutionary groups such as Anushilan Samiti and Jugantar were dominant Armed attempts against the British Raj from Bengal reached a climax when Subhas Chandra Bose led the Indian National Army from Southeast Asia against the British
